title: Irv Gotti Interview and More
itunes:title: Irv Gotti Interview and More
description:
Friday 6/9- Today on the show we had producer and founder of Murder Inc, Irv Gotti come by where he spoke about relaunching Murder Inc., his new tv series "Tales" and possibly have thrown some shots at 50 Cent. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that he described as a sexual deviant because he raped and sexually assaulted them. Moreover, based off what Irv Gotti said about being able to be faithful because he is "all f'd out" we opened up the phone lines and asked our listeners if they agree with Irv Gotti's comments.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 6/9- Today on the show we had producer and founder of Murder Inc, Irv Gotti come by where he spoke about relaunching Murder Inc., his new tv series "Tales" and possibly have thrown some shots at 50 Cent. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that he described as a sexual deviant because he raped and sexually assaulted them. Moreover, based off what Irv Gotti said about being able to be faithful because he is "all f'd out" we opened up the phone lines and asked our listeners if they agree with Irv Gotti's comments.
